response.message: Congratulations to animuson and JNat; you both well deserve joining the team, and good luck being blamed for everyth- err, I mean, with your new jobs! :)
Given some of the posts from animuson on Meta, my deep condolences for the Stack Overflow community!

Hah, look your first feedback via comments on your welcome blog post! 

Congrats on the new job and good luck :)
Congratulations on your new positions, Keep up the good work!

so much disrespect I see on this site, people policing each other for the sake of being right and having someone to police. the site is an invaluable source of information but I am constantly disappointed by the demeanor and unfriendly attitude towards those who don't perfectly match the ideal
Wow! Congratulations!
Congratulations! Jee Jee :3

If you adjusted their titles to "Community Operations Growth Specialists", you could refer to them as "COGS".

Congratulations! I look forward to seeing their positive influence on the network.
Congratulations!
I feel like I am missing some clever reason why the title is phrased memetically. Anyone care to fill me in?
Congratulations and strong nerves for doing the job. To help users with their problems is a very important and often invidious job. You have my full veneration.
Am impressed. Congs and wish you the best life has to offer. Wish we could be really good friends.
Congratulations.

Good job 
!!
Nathan Tuggy: The opportunities to annoy users across the network  (including, say, MathOverflow) are rare and shouldn't be missed.

Congratulations! Very happy for you...and it looks as though I am going to be your first/ worst case. I am having a lot harder time than I thought I would. I am taking two courses for beginners, one I started today, the other doesn't start the next class till the middle of next month...anyways, I am so lost and confused I think I need to delete my mess. Please help when you get a chance. Thank you so much.
@NathanTuggy See, for example, http://meta.stackexchange.com/q/37597/254929
@Air: *There* we go!
Congratulations you guys! New things are so exciting :)
I guess i must be getting old. I keep seeing the title of your post on the sidebar in my SE activity and it kind of looks Turkish to me: I have to look twice to see that's it's actually English!
animuson is a really bad choice for this. So Congrats JNat!!

Ah, before I could comment , someone commented my thoughts @Mike.
animuson needs to pull up his socks for sure.
Congratulations and strong nerves for doing the job. To help users with their problems is a very important and often invidious job. You have my full veneration.
a
And animuson goofs up yet again. Seriously guys, why keep him? http://meta.stackexchange.com/questions/256254/sexism-in-conversation-moderation-or-why-wasnt-i-suspended
I am impressed with the great choice. Thank you
